ï»¿STATUTORY COMMITTEE REPORT TO: The President, International Bank for Reconstruction and Development Report of the Committee under Scction 4 (iii) of Article III of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Loan (Third Development Policy Loan to Foster More Inclusive Growth) to the Republic of the Philippines The undersigned Commitee constituted under Section 7 of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Bank Ir Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) hereby submits its report pursuant to Section 4 (iii) of Article III of said Articles in respect of the proposal that the Bank grant to the Republic o 'the Philippines (the Borrower) a loan in an amount equal to US$300,000,000. The purpose cf said loan is to support the Borrower's program of actions, objectives and policies designed tc promote growth and achieve sustainable reduction in poverty. 1. The Committee has carefi Ily studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a loan, and of the purpose to which the procecds of the loan are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the program toward the financing of which the proceeds of such loan are to be .pplied comes within the purposes of the Bank as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said program is designed to promote the development of the productive facilities and resources of the Borrower and is in the interest of the Borrower and of the members of tie Bank as a whole.
ï»¿-2- (Republic of the Philippines) (Third Development Policy Loan to Foster More Inclusive Growth) 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said program merits financial assistance from the Bank, and hereby recommends said )rogram for such assistance. COMMITTEE Senior Yc4 Pre'sident and oup General Counsel Expert Ylected by 6overnor for the Republic of the Philippines Regio resident East A nd Pacific Region Vice President and WBG Chief Risk Officer Senior Vice President and Chief Economist Dated at Washington, D.C 9 f3
